name: Zombie Football
description:
Zombie Football is a third person view Zombie football simulation game.
The player controls teddy Zombie, score a goal by pushing it into the goal.

Zombie Actions:Slide, Vaut, Sprint, Attack, Left Fall, Right Fall.
Slide: the default keyboard button is "E". Press the button, the teddy Zombie will slide a distance.
Vaut:the default keyboard button is "R". Press the button, the teddy Zombie will vaut.
Sprint:the default keyboard button is "Space". Press the button, the teddy Zombie will storage capacity, then release the button, the teddy Zombie will sprint a distance.
 

Game Mode:Single Player and Co-op.
Single Player：
When the game start, the player control the teddy Zombie, push the football to red goal by against a NPC Zombie. The player Each gets five goals, the game will create one more NPC Zombie. There will be at most five Zombies. The player can restart the game anytime.

Local Co-op:
The player can choose to build a Master Server / LAN Game or connect to a server by other player as a client.
Before start/join a Co-op game, the player can choose red/blue team.
Only the player who build Master Server can restart the Co-op game.
